title: First Win of the Day mission missing
body:
Hiya!
I think I may have a problem, it's the second day I haven't received First Win of the Day mission! It doesn't show up at all!
{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}} 
I'd really appreciate some help, without it I'm missing out on substantial amount of xp... Thank you!

replies.body: Hey there, the FWotD mission will become available at level 15!

Maybe It's good to apply FWotD mission to every level since it's too hard for me to level up before 15.
Because it's hard to level up now, it make that even harder for me to purchase a champion, especially the 6300 ones, and push me away from the game since it cost too much time.
I think it will be a good idea to adjust the exp reward of the FWotD mission related to level, for example, 575 exp for those above Lv.15 and 275 exp or less for those below Lv.15.

Thats good to know. Could you please have someone fix the last paragraph of the daily missions section of this ( https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752824 ) article as it implies that we should get the quest earlier.
Iam level 31... i dont get FWotD mission :D
Hey there, I just checked and you do have the mission available, you'll just need to win a matchmade game!
Yes! Having the same issue. A response would be appreciated thanks.

I am not getting any missions at all 

Please help

so i just started leveling another account, and w/o first win of the day bonus, i'm averaging about 110 XP a game. at level 12  it's taken 10 games to level up. really disappointing that there's no FWotD bonus...i don't think it should take 10 games to go form level 12 to 13...there's been one game that's been +20 minutes long, every other game players just ff at 15 mins or open mid and feed. pretty sad/troll/toxic
Me too, and I have not got my 575 xp for first win twice this week, and today,  I did not play, but first win shows repeating, is it a bug?
I get the mission, but only after I win a game, after I win one the mission appears and I'm able to do it then.
I haven't got FWotD nor any kind of game rewards such as key fragments and hextech boxes recently, btw I'm lv20 now. Please respond to me, thank you
i have the same problem too
I have the same problem on my second account on euw server :(
